message.body: Hey could we move Oaklands walk to between 2-530?
Not sure if you have time or if you do this but is it possible to do a double walk, like an hour, instead of just a half hour. Even if most of that time is playtime inside or on the porch?
We offer hour walks! Text Brittany for more details
ï¿¼
(That is not her address any more just FYI. She lives in cc now.)
I have her number. I'll text her. Do you have time for that today?
Jason- oakland
Yes maybe, but I'm not sure who this is :)
Oh! Yes
And I saw that you wanted it later today too
I saw that text. That is perfect
Awesome!
There is peanut butter on the open shelf of our pantry armoire if you want to give him a dollop of stick some in a toy
Yes
Treats are always ok. Pretty much as much as you want as long as it's usually with a command
Ya he starts vibrating when he sees them lol
Ps I've been giving him treats after recrating him but only last two weeks
Is that ok?
Ok! Yes!
He would kill his own mom for those treats hahahahahahaha
What a happy puppy
Yes! I make him go back in the crate if he wants the treat and he LUNGES for that crate hahahaha
That's great. It's good reinforcement
I only give him one tiny one as a reward for listening when I say to go back in to crate
No walk for oakland today
